createServiceAgreement(bytes32,bytes32,a.details: Creates a new service agreement and adds it to mapping

params._billables: Determines if the service node on index of _hashes has an associated billing unit
params._children: The hashes of the child services
params._client: The contractor of the service agreement
params._contractor: The contractor of the service agreement
params._documents: The hashes of contract documents of the service agreement
params._parent: The hash of the parent service
params._parents: The hashes of parent services of the service specified in same index of _hashes
params._service: The hash of the service agreement

setServiceStage(bytes32,uint8).details: Updates the stage of a service agreement

params._service: The hash of the service to be updated
params._stage: The new stage of the service
